info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 9 at 11:52AM AST until May 9 at 3:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Caguas, Canovanas, Carolina, Gurabo, San Juan and Trujillo Alto.
* WHEN...Until 300 PM AST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1151 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen, particularly across southern Canovanas, Carolina, and Trujillo, as well as northern Gurabo and Caguas. These thunderstorms will continue to spread across the area, causing urban and small stream flooding within the next few hours. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Trujillo Alto, Gurabo, Carolina, Caguas, Canovanas, Guaynabo, Celada, Bairoa, Campo Rico, Santa Barbara, San Isidro, Lomas and Benitez. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Caguas, PR; Canovanas, PR; Carolina, PR; Gurabo, PR; San Juan, PR; Trujillo Alto, PR
